[[Image:FlamingArrow.jpg|150px|thumb|right|Cover to ''The Flaming Arrow'', which Oltion wrote with Jerry Oltion.]]
 
'''Kathy Oltion''' is a [[science fiction]] [[novelist]] known primarily for her ''[[Star Trek]]'' work, which began with publication in the first two ''[[Star Trek: Strange New Worlds|Strange New Worlds]]'' anthologies from [[Pocket Books]] ("See Spot Run" in the first, "The Quick and the Dead" in the second).
'''Kathy Oltion''' is a [[science fiction]] [[novelist]] known primarily for her ''[[Star Trek]]'' work, which began with publication in the first two ''[[Star Trek: Strange New Worlds|Strange New Worlds]]'' anthologies from [[Pocket Books]] ("See Spot Run" in the first, "The Quick and the Dead" in the second).
